room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Providence
review: We had a great time even though we didn't beat the clock. Amanda, our host aka Watson, kept us on our toes and made it really fun. We can't wait to go back and try the game room.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Providence
review: My husband and I did Sherlock's Library last night. We were joined by 4 other people whom we did not know. We had a blast! The puzzles were different than any we had ever experienced before. We worked great as a team! And to top it off we beat the existing record for the room! We will definitely go back to try the Gameroom!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Providence
review: We celebrated our friend's 40th birthday here and what a great time it was! We did the Library room and truly enjoyed it. I will say it was not easy, but so much fun! Highly recommend giving this a try. You won't be disappointed.
